title: Yami Shibai 6 (Yamishibai: Japanese Ghost Stories 6)
synopsis: Late at night, in a clearing within a dark fog-filled forest, there sits a kamishibai storyboard. A visitor approaches, and suddenly, the fog recedes. A shape begins to take form beside the boardâ€”this figure is the masked Storyteller, who once again starts to spin tales of horror and despair.
